name: ids-enterprise-wc
description: The Web Component version of the IDS Enterprise component library
author: Infor Design

scripts.build:dist: bun x rimraf build/dist/development && bun x tsc && bun x webpack --config ./webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build:dist:prod: bun x rimraf build/dist/production && bun x tsc && bun x webpack --config ./webpack.config.prod.js --mode production
scripts.build: bun x rimraf build/dist/development && bun x webpack --config ./webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.build:coverage: bun x rimraf build/dist/development && node --max-old-space-size=8192 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack --config ./webpack.config.dev.js --env coverage
scripts.build:stats: bun x rimraf build/dist/production && bun x webpack --config ./webpack.config.dist.js --mode production
scripts.copy-static:dev: cp -f package-dist.json build/dist/development/package.json && cp -f README.md build/dist/development && cp -f LICENSE build/dist/development
scripts.copy-static:prod: cp -f package-dist.json build/dist/production/package.json && cp -f README.md build/dist/production && cp -f LICENSE build/dist/production
scripts.start: bun x rimraf build/development && node --max-old-space-size=8192 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack serve --live-reload --open --config ./webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.lint: bun x eslint src test && bun x stylelint src/**/**/*.scss --config .stylelintrc.json && bun run mdlint && bun x htmlhint 'src/**/*.html'
scripts.publish:dry-run: bun run build:dist:prod && bun run copy-static:prod && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.publish:npm: bun run build:dist:prod && bun run copy-static:prod && cd build/dist/production && npm publish
scripts.publish:debug: bun run build:dist && bun run copy-static:dev && cd build/dist/development && npm publish
scripts.publish:link: bun run build:dist && bun run copy-static:dev && cd build/dist/development && npm link
scripts.test:ci: bun run test:ui && bun run test:percy
scripts.test:percy:local: bun x percy exec -- bun run test:percy
